name: Flamingo Fiasco
description:
Mingo the Flamingo is in trouble! They need to deliver an important letter to the owners of the local shop for ancient vases and ludicrously expensive porcelain dishes. But this season their allergies are out of control, causing them to sneeze uncontrollably!

Can you help Mingo navigate through the shop without causing a terrible (and expensive!) mess?

IMPORTANT: Reaching the end of the level is currently bugged! If you reached it and can't move anymore, you can press R to restart or Escape to quit!

Controls:
W/S: forward/backward
A/D: turn left/right

Made according to the theme "out of control" for #GMTKjam 2020.

Team:

  • Jannik Boysen (Code,  3D Art)
  • Lowis Schwahn (Code,  Sound)
  • Jonna Greve / ZombieFerret (2D Art, 3D Art)

Additional music and sounds provided by Finn Ringhoff.
